plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Sometimes cows like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I am often found in a field.
💚 I am the color of a frog.

plant.question: I am round and red and grow on a plant. You can eat me! What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 I am the same color as an apple.
🍽️ People put me on their salads.

plant.question: I am big and brown and have lots of leaves. Birds like to build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I lose my leaves in the fall.

plant.question: I am yellow and you peel me to eat me. Monkeys love me! What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am the color of the sun.

plant.question: I am a flower with bright yellow petals. I turn my head to follow the sun. What am I?

hints.text: 🌞 I turn my head to follow the sun during the day.
🌾 Birds love to eat my seeds.

plant.question: I grow underground, I am orange and rabbits love to eat me. What am I?
I have a long green stem and a colorful flower on top. Bees love to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐝 Bees come to collect my nectar.

plant.question: I am a very tall tree with needles instead of leaves. People decorate me for Christmas. What am I?

hints.text: ⭐ I am decorated with lights and ornaments.
🌲 I stay green all year long.

plant.question: I am a green vegetable that looks like a tiny tree. You can eat me raw or cooked. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I look like a small tree.

plant.question: I am a fruit that grows on a vine and is green or purple. Sometimes, people make me into juice or raisins. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 You can eat a lot of me at once
🍷 I am used to make wine

food.question: I am yellow and yummy. Monkeys love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍌 I grow on trees in bunches!
😋 You peel me before you eat me.

food.question: I am round and red. Sometimes I'm in sauce. What am I?

hints.text: 🔴 I can be sliced and put on a sandwich.
🥫 Ketchup and pizza sauce are made from me.

food.question: I am white and cold. You eat me with a spoon. What am I?

hints.text: 🥣 You might put sprinkles on top.

food.question: I am long and orange. Bunnies love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🧡 I am good for your eyes.
🐰 Bugs Bunny eats me all the time!

food.question: I am white and come from a cow. You can drink me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥣 You can pour me on cereal.

food.question: I am small and green. You find me in a pod. What am I?

hints.text: 🪴 You might eat me with butter.
👪 There can be lots of me in one place.

food.question: I am brown and crunchy. I can be sweet or salty. What am I?

hints.text: 🍪 I am often eaten as a treat.
🍫 Some have chocolate chips in them.

food.question: I am a grain and I am often eaten for breakfast. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I come in many shapes and sizes.
🥣 You can put milk and fruit on me.

food.question: I am yellow and you spread me on bread. Bees make my home. What am I?
I am made from apples and good in pies. What am I?

hints.text: 🍂 I am usually ripe in the fall.
